TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Instead, they just destroyed the pavement and filled it with quails. Aggressive, bloodthirsty, armored, super quails.
Quails.
I wish quailsquails quails.

Quail

I wish K.S.P. had other solar systems.

Granted, but they are 10x bigger than the stock solar system and have 10x the gravity.

I wish for more stock a like planets.

`

Edited February 7, 2021 by LVL 9001

Granted. It's a single word, hidden in the HOCGaming charity livestream. (srsly, he probably did say something in that stream)

I wish for a regular dozen.

Granted, you get a doezen demons.

I wish for an explosive birthday cake.

Granted... Boom (there was a nuke in there)

I want a pet walrus.

there... I made it. I materialized it in such a way that its teeth are piercing you right now

I wish for a free app

Granted... Have fun eating your free apple

I wish Jeb would stop ruining my missions.

Granted, now other kerbals will ruin your missions

I wish for 42 police officers eating donuts to fight over a pencil

Granted. Let the pencil-bombing-run commence.

I wish for Internet Explorer to not be my default browser anymore.

Congratulations, I just erased your OS and installed Linux.

I wish I had hair again.

Granted. It's not on your head.

I wish for to live somewhere not as frigid.

Granted. Welcome to Mercury!

I wish for more good movies.

Granted. All of them are designed to specifically exclude your demographic, and as such, you do not like them.

I wish I liked more things.

`

Edited February 7, 2021 by LVL 9001

Granted, he makes many more professional ksp banana videos .

I wish I had a game that's probably going in open alpha in December right now.

Granted. Desert Bus Simulator 2. Now in alpha!

I wish Linux was used everywhere (no saying anything to do with viruses!).

Granted. The universe is being controlled by a desktop Linux comp. The nerd who owns it decides to make the sun roar and smash the earth to pieces on its head.

I wish for an angry sun, like the one the nerd made.

Granted. The angry Sun claims the first post on every page of every forum game and fills it with hate.

I wish I could Linux better.

Granted, you now see the world in command line only. And your Enter key is broken.

I wish for less traffic on the road.

Granted. People can no longer illegally trade on the road.

I wish for a bold man, with extra thick lines.

Ok! *Gives you the word "man" on a piece of paper... it's definitely bold with extra thick lines*

I wish that everyone has a chance to go to space.

Granted... Now everybody is in space and nobody can send a rocket to get them back down.

I wish for good cold lemonade.

Granted, Guess where I got it from!

I wish I had the experience of a professional Kerbal space program player.
